title: Interpretation of a bridge in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of a bridge in a dream

preview.html: BridgeInterpretation of a dream of a broken bridgeA wooden bridge in a dreamFalling a bridge in a dreamInterpretation of crossing a bridgeInterpretation of a dream of crossing a bridge on waterInterpretation of a dream of an underwater bridgeInterpretation of a dream of crossing a roadSeeing a high bridge in a dreamIf you see in your dream that you are crossing or crossing a bridge, this indicates a change that will occur in your practice or your general life, as it can The change will be positive if the bridge is extended between two shores or banks in the correct way. Or that something bad is about to happen, and Ibn Sirin adds that seeing the bridge collapsing means failure, death, or divorce. Crossing and crossing the bridge in a dream. If the bridge you cross in your dream is high or long, this means a decisive stage in your life. If you are single, this indicates marriage. Close or far, depending on the length and span of the bridge. As for an unmarried woman, if she sees in her dream that she is standing on a bridge, this indicates her deep fears and need for security. While crossing or crossing a bridge in a dream for a married woman indicates a profound change in her life, which is ultimately a positive change in her path and resources, or in children, or regarding family life and its stability. As for a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that she is crossing a bridge or crossing it easily, this is considered in dream interpretation to be a sign of a natural and easy birth, and the bridge can benefit the fetus or male newborn. As for the divorced woman, seeing her crossing the bridge is evidence that she is overcoming the ordeal of divorce and that her life in the future will be much better, thanks to God and his help. The dream indicates a new marriage. As for the widow who recently lost her husband, crossing the bridge in a dream indicates that she has overcome the ordeal of grief and the pain of separation, and the bridge here may symbolize a good ending if she sees him lending it. Quickly and successfully. A high or high suspension bridge in a dream. A large or long and long bridge, which is very high and very high, seeing it in a dream expresses critical or dangerous stages in our lives, and the suspension bridge symbolizes exams, especially graduation exams for the student and the student. The high bridge in a man’s dream indicates that he is doing something that involves financial risks or that he is starting to achieve something that will leave positive results. The high bridge in the dream of an unmarried girl, that is, an unmarried woman, symbolizes a man who is distinguished in knowledge or knowledge. A long, tall, or hanging bridge in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the immunity of the home and the freedom of the home from troubles, and it also symbolizes security in money and livelihood. A high, high, or suspended bridge in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of a blessed or easy birth. As for the widow’s dream, a high, high or suspended bridge indicates the status of her deceased husband and his good end, and God knows best. Interpretation of a bridge falling or collapsing in a dream: A bridge falling in a dream indicates the collapse of human relations and the interruption of means of communication between people. As for the man who sees the suspension bridge falling or collapsing, this is a sign of his failure to manage his affairs. For single people, the

title: Interpretation of a dream about war in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the visions that causes panic, anxiety, and horror for many people who see a vision of war in a dream, as the presence of war means destruction, bloodshed, and other scourges of war. He is the scholar Ibn Sirin who dealt with the interpretation of this vision through interpretation, but according to what the dreamer saw signs and signals in his dream, and we will learn through this article in the Encyclopedia of the interpretation of seeing war in a dream. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if he sees in a dream an outbreak A war between sultans, this indicates the spread of strife and epidemic in the country, but if one sees the presence of a war between subjects, this indicates high prices and high prices. And the spread of poverty in the country. But if one sees in his dream that he is in a state of war and he sits with the soldiers and eats with them, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will enter into a major conflict with the people around him, but this conflict will end soon without any problems. If one sees in The dream is that he is in a state of war and he uses all weapons, such as spears, arrows, and bows to fight, then this indicates that the dreamer is seeking to achieve his ambitions by all means. Interpretation of the vision of war between the subjects and the Sultan by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: If one sees in a dream a war breaking out between the ruler and the subjects, this means cheap prices. The return of prosperity and stability to the country. They will enrich him and isolate him. But if a man sees in a dream that there is a state of war taking place in his field of work, then this vision indicates that there is a situation of radical change that will occur in his life. But if a person sees in a dream that he is fighting for the sake of God against an unjust ruler and stabbed him with an arrow, then this The vision shows the closeness of that person to God Almighty, but if he drops the sword, it indicates that this person is honorable and does not accept injustice. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: If a person sees in a dream that he is on the battlefield, then this vision indicates that the dreamer He has a relationship with a girl, but her heart is hard and she will treat him badly. Problems that cannot be solved.But if one sees in a dream that there is a war and that there are many corpses, this means that many bad events will occur in the dreamer’s life.Interpretation of seeing war in a married woman’s dreamDream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees in her dream That a fierce war is raging between him and his family members, then this vision indicates that there are serious differences between her and her husband, but if she sees that the wife is waging a fierce war against her family, then this vision indicates that her husband is subjected to a state of severe injustice. But if she sees that her husband He stabs her in the stomach with a sword, as this indicates that she will soon become pregnant and God will give her a son. You will have a son, but he will be ugly. Interpretation of seeing war in an unmarried girl’s dream. Dream interpretation jurists say: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her fiancé is in a state of war, this indicates that Someone is talking about her fiancé in a bad way. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about white sneakers for a single woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about white sports shoes for a single woman in a dream, as it is one of the strange dreams that cause strangeness and surprise many people, which makes them wonder about the meaning of the interpretation associated with it, because they did not know whether the vision was one of the auspicious visions, or one of the visions that has an ominous harbinger, as the interpretation of the dream differs from one person to another according to the social status and symbols and suggestions present in the priest's dream, and on the basis of it, the scholars of interpretation put a set of interpretations and we present to you in our article a set of interpretations of the dream of white sports shoes for individuals in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of white sports shoes for a single woman in a dream The scholars of interpretation mentioned different things in the dream of white sports shoes in a dream, as the majority of scholars saw that the dream is one of the commendable visions, which carries different meanings and implications, and we show you some of them. :For example, when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing sports shoes, this is a sign that this girl will soon get married and marry a religious man with high morals. But when an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing white shoes while sleeping, this is a clear symbol and evidence that there is a person in her life who deceives her and deceives her and pretends to love her and cling to her, but in reality he is completely the opposite and that he does not care about her or care about her in the first place. As for the unmarried girl who sees herself buying white shoes while sleeping, this is an indication of some positive and radical changes that will occur in this girl's life and that she will fulfill all the wishes she wanted to accomplish. Seeing sports shoes in general in an unmarried girl's dream has some connotations of goodness, hope, vitality and activity and indicates that this girl is enthusiastic about practicing sports constantly and takes care of her body and health, and God Almighty is higher and more knowledgeable. The unseen. Interpretation of seeing white sneakers in a dream for a married woman The interpretation of a dream about white sneakers in a dream for a single girl differs from a married woman, but in general it brings good news and good luck to the fortune teller, but it may bring a bad omen to his life, and this is reflected in him in real life. We offer you some of these interpretations such as: While if a married woman sees white sneakers with a wonderful shape, but she missed them and tries to search for them a lot, but does not find them in her sleep, this is a sign that this woman is exposed to some marital problems that lead to the disintegration of cohesion and harmony between her family and will affect the happiness of all members of her family. But if a married woman sees in her sleep that she is wearing black sneakers, this is a sign that this woman will improve her financial level because her husband will find another job that will pay him more than he used to get in his previous work. . Also, the sign of a married woman seeing that she is wearing white sneakers with a wonderful and attractive shape, and this is a symbol of the marital happiness that this woman lives, and that she lives a stable and secure married life. And that she prefers her married life to life

title: Interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: We often see in our dreams what worries us and what is happening within us. Disagreement, and we are looking for an interpretation and what bothers women. What bothers women most is the interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman, and this dream can carry a symbol. It is bad and what is good, but the meaning of the vision varies from one person to another and from the circumstances of one person to another, so there are many interpretations for each person and their circumstances, so follow us to learn about the concepts and interpretations.Interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dream for a son Sirin: If a wife sees that her husband is with a beautiful woman in a dream, this means that this wife is negligent in her duties towards her husband. If the wife sees that her husband is quarreling with her because of another beautiful woman, this indicates that the man is mistreating his wife and fears God with her. But if A woman saw that her husband had divorced her for the sake of another woman. This is evidence that conditions may change between her and her husband for the worse, and alerts the wife to her readiness to restore the relationship between her and her husband. Her husband. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who talks a lot with a woman. This indicates that her husband is talkative and delves into the woman’s symptoms. This vision could be a warning to the husband to refrain from that and to his wife to help him. Whoever sees her husband shaking hands with another woman, this is evidence that her husband has entered into a partnership or partnership with her. Trade and this may be a successful business. Seeing a deceased husband in a dream with a beautiful woman is evidence of the husband’s good status in the future. Seeing a dead husband in a dream having sex with another woman means that the woman will get married soon and her situation will become better. Who saw that her husband is engaged? Seeing a wife talking to her husband is considered a good dream, without the interpretation of seeing a husband with another woman in a dream: Some scholars interpret that this is evidence of the husband’s intense love for his wife. However, if the wife sees that her husband is proposing to her again, this indicates that he has problems at work. It ends quickly. And we rejoice (because in another saying). The husband’s engagement to his wife again in the dream is evidence of harmony and love between them, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a husband cheating on his wife in a dream? If a wife sees in a dream that her husband is cheating on her with her sister, this is evidence of Her sister’s jealousy of her. If the wife sees that her husband is cheating on a woman she does not know, the evidence for this is that the wife may violate his rights with her husband, so this is considered a warning vision for her. Seeing the husband’s repeated betrayal may indicate his need for more attention and care on the part of his wife. What is the meaning of the other woman’s affection for my husband? As we indicated at the beginning of the article, the interpretation varies depending on the viewer’s circumstances and psychology, and they may simply be messages buried in the subconscious: The interpretation of this dream is that the married woman loves her husband with great love, and he exchanges the same feeling with her. If the widow sees that her dead husband is caressing her This is interpreted as asking her for forgiveness or charity. Interpretation of a dream about a woman seducing my husband, this is an interpretation of the financial distress they are going through and that the husband is spending his money in illegal ways. If the wife dreams of her husband kissing another woman, this is

title: Interpretation of trust in a dream and the meaning of restoring trust

preview.html: Seeing honesty in a dream is possible, because it symbolizes obligations and their fulfillment or betrayal, and it is possible that honesty is a symbol of obedience to God or disobedience in the case of betrayal. Here we will talk in detail about the interpretation of trust in a dream, the interpretation of trust in a dream, the interpretation of the return of trust in a dream, and betrayal of trust In a dream, and the interpretation of a dream about trust from a dead person, for this we followed with interest. Honesty in a dream Seeing sincerity in a dream has many interpretations, depending on the state of honesty in the dream, and according to the state of the dreamer and the circumstances of the vision. Seeing honesty in a dream can be a sign of responsibilities and burdens. And honesty in The dream is that if you give it to someone, especially if it is money, then this is a symbol of placing secrets, worries and sadness on that person. Trust in a dream is like gold and silver with a person. This symbolizes the dreamer’s trust in that person for a job or task. Leaving trust with the wife in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s trust in his wife in reality and that he trusts her with his home, honor, and honour. As for placing trust in the dream with the person and writing that trust to him, this may indicate To the person’s conversion to Islam is in the hands of the dreamer. The interpretation of obtaining trust in a dream symbolizes the conclusion of contracts and agreements, and refusing to obtain trust is a sign of rejecting Islam. As for seeing honesty in a woman’s dream in general, it is evidence of morals, faith, and religion. The interpretation of seeing trust in a man’s dream A rich person is evidence of his commitment to remembering God and not distracting himself from Him. Interpretation of a dream about giving trust in a dream to a poor person is a sign of satisfaction with God’s judgment. See also: Taking money from someone in a dream Interpretation of a dream of earning money Interpretation of assuming trust in a dream Interpretation of taking trust in a dream in a way General is a sign of concluding contracts and agreements. The interpretation of trust in a dream without knowing what is inside it could be a sign that the dreamer is living his worldly life with lies and deception. As for the interpretation of taking trust in a dream is money or wording, it symbolizes the assignment of difficult tasks and responsibilities that require effort And tired. Interpretation of assuming trust in a dream. The husband is one who trusts his wife’s trust, so this is a sign of preserving her dignity, dignity and honour. Interpretation of receiving trust in a dream from one of the parents is an indication that they are teaching him religion, as well as taking trust in the dream from one of the children. Interpretation of removing Trust in a dream from a deceased person, that is, a certificate of his death. As for trusting in the dream of a pious and righteous person, it is the call of God Almighty. Interpretation of the return of trust in a dream. As for the interpretation of the return of trust in a dream, it has several positive connotations that bring goodness to the dreamer. The interpretation of the return of trust in a dream may symbolize The return of an expatriate or traveler. The interpretation of a dream about the return of trust can be an indication of the fulfillment of a dream or a desire. The interpretation of the return of trust in a dream in general is an indication of a good return to the dreamer. Betrayal of trust in a dream. As for betrayal of trust in a dream, it does not deserve praise, because it indicates On betrayal of the covenant and breach of the covenant. The betrayal of trust in the dream is from the dreamer himself, so this indicates his denial of his blessings, and God forbid. As for

title: Interpretation of seeing the sunrise from the west in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sunrise from the west in a dream or dreams via the vision website Roy2a.com by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir and Imam Al-Sadiq as a vision of the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west in a dream shows the dreamer’s remorse for his sins and disobedience, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision for an unmarried girl And a married woman, and a pregnant woman, and a man and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing the sun rising from the west in a dream: Seeing the sun rising in the west in a dream about a single girl is an indication of her negligence in performing the duties of prayer and her complete separation from matters of her religion. Seeing the sun rising in the west in a dream about A single girl is a sign that she lies and deceives others and people who hate her. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sun setting in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the sun rising from the west in a dream for a married woman: A married woman seeing the sun rising from the west in a dream is an indication of his distance from thinking about the matters of the afterlife and her separation from The world. A married woman seeing the sun rising in the west in a dream is a sign that she feels fear and dread about many things in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing the sun rising from the west in a dream for a divorced woman: A divorced woman seeing the sun rising in the west in a dream is an indication of her extreme fear of the Day of Resurrection and the need to arrange Her life and interest in her religious matters. A vision of an absolute woman feeding her son and witnessing the horror of the Day of Resurrection. The dream indicates that she is going through a very difficult time raising her children. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer clothes in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the horrors of the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a man: A man who sees the horrors of the Day of Resurrection in a dream is an indication of... His distance from the teachings of his religion and his lack of strict commitment to the word of God Almighty. Seeing a person watching the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west in a dream is a sign of his remorse for his false testimony before the judiciary. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Hour of Resurrection in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing the horrors of the Day of Resurrection in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman She sees the horror of the Day of Resurrection in a dream, indicating her lack of commitment to prayer and matters of religion and the wrath of God upon him. Seeing a pregnant woman watching the Day of Resurrection in a dream and the sun rising from the west is a sign of standing by her husband so that he can pray regularly and become closer to God Almighty. What is the interpretation of seeing the horrors of the Day of Resurrection in a dream? A young man’s dream: A young man sees the horrors of the Day of Resurrection in a dream, indicating his extreme sadness over not observing the duties of prayer and the many sins and disobedience in his life. A young man watching the sunrise from the west in a dream indicates many mistakes in his life and his attempt to correct them and keep him away from the path of deception. See also: Interpretation of a vision Two moons and one sun in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the sun in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried girl seeing the sun in a dream indicates great successes in her life after many hours of fatigue. A single girl seeing the sun in a dream is a sign of the approaching happy marriage again and creation. Seeing the sun in a dream For a single girl, it indicates the arrival of joy and happiness in her life after a period of intense sadness. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the horror of the Day of Resurrection? Seeing the horror of the Day of Resurrection

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a large house and many rooms for a married woman: We will explain to you through a few simple points the interpretation of a dream about seeing a large house containing many rooms for a married woman in a dream: If a married woman dreams that she is in a large house filled with many spacious rooms. It indicates this woman’s desire. In getting closer to God, returning to God, repenting for all the actions she has done, and seeking forgiveness. If a married woman dreams that she is in a big house with many rooms. This indicates that the woman will enter a new stage in her life and her life will change for the better, such as: The appearance of pregnancy or her moving to a new job in her professional life. If a married woman dreams that she will move to live in a new and large house. It contains many spacious rooms and was actually supposed to be. This indicates the strong love between her and her husband and her husband’s strong faith in her. If a married woman also dreams that she will move to live in a new, large house that contains many rooms, and she does not intend to do so in reality. This indicates impending problems and the emergence of many crises with her husband. If a married woman sees in a dream a large, beautiful, and wonderful house with many Of the rooms. This indicates that nourishment is close to her and she will receive many beautiful things. If a married woman sees in a dream, she sees a large and beautiful house. This indicates her intense love for her home, her husband, and her children and that she is very satisfied with her life and loves them very much. If the married woman She dreams of entering a large and spacious house with many large and spacious rooms. This indicates that she will be free of all crises and problems in her life in the coming period, God willing. She will get rid of all the difficult circumstances that she and her husband are going through. If a married woman dreams of seeing a large house collapsing, This means that someone in her life is about to die, and this portends a bad omen for her. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms. Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for single people. There are many clues and interpretations to interpret the dream of a big house and many rooms for single people, and we will explain You can do this through some of the following points: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a large and spacious house containing many rooms. This indicates the imminent marriage of this woman and she will marry a good and loving man who has many good qualities. Moreover, this man will Rich. If an unmarried woman dreams of seeing a large two-story house with many rooms. This indicates that this woman will move to a beautiful new life in the future, such as: marriage or moving to a new job in her professional life. If an unmarried woman dreams To see a large house containing many rooms. This indicates that she is living an independent and happy life and will marry a new person who will propose to her in the near future, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is in a large and spacious house containing many rooms. And that

title: Interpretation of the dream of removing dead skin from the leg according to various interpretation scholars

preview.html: Do you see in your dreams that the skin of your feet is peeling, is dead skin being removed from it? We will now help you learn its meaning. Interpretation of the dream of removing dead skin from the leg. What he has and what. Interpretation of the dream of removing dead skin from the leg in a dream: The leg in the dream symbolizes, according to many interpreters, the power of a person that comes from his money or from his children. The leg also symbolizes A person's integrity and good deeds, and also symbolizes his readiness for life and its duties. Many interpretive scholars agree that legs in a dream are good visions. Removing dead skin in a dream symbolizes the presence of a new life for the dreamer that may be better than his previous life. If the dead skin is removed from the foot and appears After it is new beautiful and clean skin, this symbolizes goodness and blessings that will come to the fortuneteller. Replacing old dead skin with a new one symbolizes changing the dreamer’s condition from bad to better thanks to God. If the sleeper sees dead skin being removed from the leg, but the leg is injured, then this is a vision Unpleasant. Removing dead skin from the foot in a dream symbolizes the death of some problems, difficulties, and obstacles that the dreamer may face and which he will overcome over time. Removing dead skin symbolizes the end of a phase of failure and the beginning of a new phase of success. It symbolizes the shedding of old dead skin and the appearance of new skin. To recovery and growth. Interpretation of the dream of peeling the leg and removing dead skin according to Ibn Sirin: The man presented his adornment, money, stability, and good deeds. Removing dead skin in the dream symbolizes goodness and benefit if the new skin is good and of good color and texture. Interpretation of the dream of peeling, removing and peeling dead skin from the foot In Al-Nabulsi: He says that a person’s leg in a dream symbolizes his livelihood, including his well-being and possessions, and the bones of his leg symbolize his money, but any harm or misfortune that happens to a man in a dream is a bad omen for his family. He also sees it. If the sleeper sees dead skin being removed from the foot And the new skin was of a good color and texture, as this heralded him relief from his distress and abundant goodness. However, my dear friend Skinny, we explained to you the explanation and interpretation of your vision of removing dead skin from the foot. We hope you like our article. We are happy to send you messages and comments on our articles, and you can send your dreams to be interpreted for you through our dream translation team. For Thin Magazine. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream of red pimples on the body. Interpretation of a dream of pimples on the face. Interpretation of seeing a dirty heel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone else’s surgery. Service Interpretation of dreams within 24 hours

title: Interpretation of seeing my son sick in a dream

preview.html: It indicates major problems, tensions, and disagreements that the dreamer will face if he is not married or committed in life. Interpretation of seeing my sick son in a dream about a single girl. If an unmarried girl dreamed that she had given birth to a child and was sick in the dream. She was very afraid of him in the dream and could not heal him. This dream indicates that something will happen to this only girl in her life. She will see the death of someone important to her, and she will be sad about this matter, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. And if an unmarried girl saw in a dream that the child was sick in the dream, then she tried to treat him or cure him in The dream, but she could not. It may indicate her illness in life and that she will live with the illness for a long time and God will help her get rid of it. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream her sick son, and searches for a cure for him in many places in the dream, and finds nothing. The dream indicates This single woman who is dreaming is facing some stress and tension in her life. She is searching hard for something important to her, but she was unable to reach it, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick person in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing my sick son in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees In a dream, her son was very sick in the dream. He did not find a doctor or anything to save him from the illness in the dream. It indicates that there are some marital and family problems that happen to this married woman in her life and that bother her a lot. If a married woman sees in a dream that her sick son has He was completely cured of his illness and she was happy to see him a lot in the dream. The dream shows that she will get rid of many of the bad things that she is going through in her life during this time and that she will live a long period of happiness. And seeing a married woman in a dream trying to find a treatment that suits her sick son in a dream, and she succeeds. In this matter. It may indicate an illness that will affect this dreaming married woman. But he will succeed in getting rid of her, God willing, this time. Interpretation of seeing my sick son in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that her sick son was very tired and exhausted, and could not find treatment. Because of his illness in the dream. This may indicate a great anxiety that the dreamer suffers from in his life and he has not been able to get rid of it. But with her closeness to God Almighty, she gets rid of it. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she saw many of her children and they were all sick in the dream, and she was unable to treat them. And this It indicates many problems and fears that the divorced woman will continue to face in her life during this time, and God knows best. Likewise, the divorced woman saw in a dream that her sick son was in pain and she was unable to alleviate his pain in the dream and became sad. It appears here that this divorced woman will face an illness that will afflict her at this time. Of her life. During this time, she will be very upset about that. Read also: Interpretation of seeing illness in a dream and its meaning in detailInterpretation of seeing my sick son in a dream about a man and its meaningIf the dreamer sees in a dream that his sick son was very tired in a dream and could not relieve him of his illness In a dream. This dream indicates a lot

title: Interpretation of a dream about cumin in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cumin: In a dream, cumin contains vital nutrients that aid digestion, improve immune system functions, and treat skin diseases, anemia, respiratory diseases and other diseases as well. Cumin in a dream shows many good things, life, the blessing of money, increased blessings, and spices and seasonings can indicate problems and disputes if damaged. Also, seeing cumin shows profits and abundant profit from trade and the like, and hopes for fulfillment and dreams. Interpretation of the vision of latent time by Ibn Sirini explains the interpretation of the dream of cumin In a dream, people who see a lot of cumin have a lot of money. Seeing dates in a dream is evidence of a person’s financial loss. A person’s dream of black cumin proves some of the differences that the dreamer faces and problems between him and his family. Interpretation of cumin for individuals. Seeing cumin in an unmarried girl’s dream means news Pleasant, happiness and joy in the coming period. Green fennel in a dream represents success, achieving goals, and good luck. Seeing that buying cumin is a sign of good luck and achieving goals and objectives. Seeing sweet cumin in a dream is a sign of new love. Buying fennel is a sign of marriage. Seeing cumin in the home is a sign of good news. Interpretation of a dream about the underlying condition of a married woman: Seeing a married woman buying cumin means that she will be happy in her married life. Interpretation of a dream about cumin In a dream, to see cumin in food means that you will obtain a new source of livelihood and many good things. Seeing green cumin in a married woman’s dream proves that she has succeeded in business and held famous positions. Cumin can also symbolize pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing latent time for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about cumin in a dream. Seeing cumin for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence of the soonest date of delivery. Red cumin indicates a woman's stress and anxiety due to fear of childbirth. Eating red cumin is considered a sign of fatigue and pain. Dreaming of buying cumin in a dream Seeing buying cumin in a dream at work is a sign of that. Success in business deals and increased profits. Selling fennel also caused heavy losses. For the individual. If a married man eats cumin in food and feels satisfied, then he has obtained a permissible source of livelihood, and his relationship with his wife is good. Interpretation of a dream about cumin in a dream. The spoilage of fennel in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness. Eating fennel in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates that he will earn money Increasing blessings and achieving happiness. Seeing cumin in a married man’s dream. He enjoys good health and can get rid of diseases. Fatigue, loss of worries and anxiety. Buying cumin in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cumin in a dream. Seeing cumin in a dream means a calm and stable life. Seeing the gift of cumin means getting rid of Stress and anxiety. Seeing rotten or damaged cumin indicates lack of faith and lack of worship. Seeing cumin in a girl’s dream indicates the right decisions made by the girl. Green cumin indicates the fulfillment of desires.
